resources.string:
Hi there! My name is Louise Gabrielle Talip, but my friends call me Loys. 

I like programming and solving puzzles. 

The kind where I'm challenged and taught to think outside the box. 

I have no idea where this interest came from, I just really like the idea of puzzles for some reason. 

I also like playing different musical instruments, reading books, and biking. 

I am currently 19 years old, taking up BS Computer Science in one of the most prestigious universities in the Philippines - the University of the Philippines Los Banos.
